author: Angela Dewan, CNN
title: Humans are terrible at being apart. Here's why and what to do about it
description: People around the world have been breaking government advice to stay at home and practice social distancing. Here's why we humans find it so hard to stay away from one another, and this is what we can do about it.
content:
(CNN)In Tokyo, crowds have been congregating in parks each day to see the cherry blossoms at peak bloom. Some 6,000 miles away in Washington DC, people were doing the exact same thing.
Like so many people in so many countries, they are willfully ignoring gov… [+9270 chars]
